p: The most excessive amount of phenolics was found in ethanolic extract of Ov, followed by the methanolic extract of Om (129.25 and 82.60 mg GAE/g, respectively). The lowest TPC was observed in aqueous extract of Tm (24.80 mg/mL). Only in the cases of Ov, Tc and Tm ethanolic and methanolic extracts were significantly different from the aqueous ones (see Table 1).
